test_message: Analyze these cleaned transactions: [{'date': '2025-01-05', 'merchant': 'Swiggy', 'amount': 450}, {'date': '2025-01-06', 'merchant': 'Zomato', 'amount': 380}, {'date': '2025-01-07', 'merchant': 'Amazon', 'amount': 2500}, {'date': '2025-01-08', 'merchant': 'Uber', 'amount': 250}, {'date': '2025-01-09', 'merchant': 'Netflix', 'amount': 199}, {'date': '2025-01-10', 'merchant': 'Flipkart', 'amount': 1200}, {'date': '2025-01-11', 'merchant': 'Starbucks', 'amount': 320}, {'date': '2025-01-12', 'merchant': 'Big Bazaar', 'amount': 3500}, {'date': '2025-01-13', 'merchant': 'Zomato', 'amount': 420}, {'date': '2025-01-14', 'merchant': 'Myntra', 'amount': 890}, {'date': '2025-01-15', 'merchant': 'Ola', 'amount': 180}, {'date': '2025-01-16', 'merchant': 'Swiggy', 'amount': 520}, {'date': '2025-01-17', 'merchant': 'SIP HDFC', 'amount': 5000}, {'date': '2025-01-18', 'merchant': 'Amazon Prime', 'amount': 299}, {'date': '2025-01-19', 'merchant': 'Zomato', 'amount': 650}, {'date': '2025-01-20', 'merchant': 'BookMyShow', 'amount': 450}, {'date': '2025-01-21', 'merchant': 'Amazon', 'amount': 780}, {'date': '2025-01-22', 'merchant': 'DMart', 'amount': 2100}]. Provide granular categorization, merchant breakdown, and habit audit.
expected_purpose: Advanced financial analysis with granular categories, merchant patterns, and behavioral insights

merchant_breakdown.insights: Swiggy makes up nearly 40% of your food delivery spend, indicating it is your preferred food delivery platform.
Zomato is your top dining merchant, accounting for almost 60% of your food delivery spending.
Starbucks represents a significant cafe visit within your dining spending.
Amazon is your largest online shopping merchant, contributing to almost 30% of your shopping category.
Flipkart is used for a notable one-time ecommerce purchase.
Big Bazaar is your highest single retail spend—more than any other shopping merchant.
Myntra used for specific apparel shopping.
DMart accounts for a significant portion of your shopping spend, likely groceries/essentials.
Netflix is your primary streaming subscription.
Amazon Prime is your higher-cost media subscription.
Uber is your most used transport provider.
Ola is used as an alternative for transport.
Single large SIP investment reflects a healthy commitment to long-term savings.
Entertainment spend is limited, indicating discretionary use.

impulsive_purchases.description: 8 purchases under ₹500 (Swiggy, Zomato, Starbucks, Uber, Ola, Netflix, BookMyShow, Amazon Prime) indicate a pattern of frequent small spends.

high_cost_dining.description: You had 1 dining transaction over ₹500 (Zomato ₹650), pointing to occasional high-value orders.

subscription_analysis.description: Netflix and Amazon Prime are active; no clear redundant subscriptions.

cut_back_opportunities.actionable_advice: Reduce discretionary shopping by 18%—limit large retail and apparel purchases next month.
Curb spontaneous small-ticket spending; set daily spend limits.

insights: Shopping forms the largest share (64.86%) of your expenses, driven by high-value purchases at Big Bazaar and Amazon.
Your investment (SIP HDFC) is strong at 29.6% of your expenses, positively impacting your long-term goals.
Dining is moderate at 14.4%, with most food orders under ₹500, showing restraint but a trend towards frequent delivery.
Your subscription payments are streamlined (Netflix, Amazon Prime) with no redundant services.
recommendations: Target a reduction in shopping expenses by prioritizing essential purchases—avoid large retail spends unless necessary.
Reduce the frequency of impulsive small-ticket purchases by setting app-specific limits or cash envelopes for food delivery and entertainment.
Maintain/increase your SIP investment rate as it aligns with healthy financial planning.
Monitor monthly subscription costs and periodically reassess necessity.
